**共同英文(****三)** **文法與字彙**

English III: Grammar and Vocabulary

**When**   Thursdays 8:10-10:00

**Where**  Pu 202

**Instructor** Dr. PiYu Chiang 江璧羽

誠709, [piyu.chiang.ntnu@gmail.com](mailto:piyu.chiang.ntnu@gmail.com)

**Course description**

This course is designed for students whose English proficiency is around intermediate level. English vocabulary and grammar will be introduced by various TOEIC-related topics. Students are expected to improve essential English grammar, English pronunciation and English vocabulary. Students will be encouraged to attend the TOEIC campus test during the semester.

**Required Textbook**

Gear, J., & Gear, R. 2010. Grammar and Vocabulary for the TOEIC Test. Cambridge University Press.

**Grading & Requirement**

**Attendance and participation: 30%**

\*Punctual attendance is required in this course. If you miss the class more than 4 times (unexcused), you will fail this course. Active participation is also highly expected.

**Tests: 40%**

\*There will be no make-up tests if you miss any of the tests, unless exceptional circumstances. Each test includes a written test (vocabulary and grammar) and a speaking test (reading out loud and answering questions).

**Group Vocabulary Presentation: 15%**

\*As a group, present/ teach us some useful expressions and vocabulary in the assigned topic in about 15 minutes. The presentation should include:

1\. Demonstration (how to use these vocabulary and phrases in real situations)

2\. Prepare an interesting comprehension quiz/ exercise/ game to the classmates

**Self-Study and Bonus 15%+**

**\*** This is to encourage students to use English outside the classroom. You should devote at least 10 hours on this self-study in this semester. (1) You are encouraged to participate in the following events, or attend a talk, an event, a show, a competition etc. in which English is the main language. Submit a list/ summary of what you do at the end of the semester. This list should include information such as date, duration, details and any other crucial information. (2) Alternatively, you can choose to practice vocabulary, reading, writing, listening, and speaking by yourself.

Here are a few suggestions for you to consider:

(1)

1\. 師大教發中心/ 圖書館 英語讀書會

**2**. 師大多益/ 托福校園考試 (期末出示考試或成績證明)

3\. 三分鐘英語簡報比賽

(2)

Check out the guidelines at: Self-Study Ideas.
